markers.marker: Adenine is a female scholarly Blade who enjoys learning above all else
Theory is a stoic female blade with ninja like qualities
Dagas is a male Blade who believes himself to be the king of a lost kingdom
Dahlia is a female Blade with rabbit features and has long hair that resembles rabbit ears
Ether Cannons are one of the weapon types in XBC2
Kasandra is a female Blade who wears a cursed mask for her special attacks
Floren is a young boy Blade with an androgyneous appearance (IT'S A TRAP)
Godfrey is a male Blade with the typical "Hero of Justice" personality
Morag and Newt are characters with military affiliations.
Poppi is an artificial Blade built by Tora and has three forms: a loli, a maid, and an onee-chan
Sheba is a female blade with the typical hoity-toity rich girl personality
Ursula is a female Blade with the appearance of a little girl and is carried around by a large polar bear
Vale is a female goth styled Blade and a chunibyo for good measure
Wulfric is an intimidating but kind-hearted male Blade with communication problems
